price: 119. Mpe tolongisaki ye na baye bazalaki elongo naye o kati ya masuwa oyo ezalaki ya kotonda.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
